articles.title: Iran, US negotiators agree on guiding principles in nuclear talks
articles.summary_kor:
Global concern about Iran’s nuclear program has lasted for many years, affecting energy markets and security alliances.
Recently, negotiators from Iran and the United States met in Geneva and agreed on several guiding principles for future nuclear talks.
The discussions came while Iran temporarily restricted traffic in the Strait of Hormuz, an important oil shipping route.
This move raised fears about oil supply disruptions and rising global energy prices.
Experts say both sides want to avoid conflict but still disagree on many technical issues.
If negotiations succeed, markets may become more stable and tensions in the Middle East could ease.
However, failure could increase military risks and economic uncertainty worldwide.
People born under Taurus may feel motivated to rethink long‑term financial plans this week.

articles.title: Canada unveils $500B defense industrial strategy
articles.title_kor: 캐나다 5,000억 달러 규모 국방 산업 전략 발표
articles.summary_kor:
Many countries are increasing defense spending due to global security uncertainty.
Canada announced a large defense industrial strategy that includes more than 500 billion dollars in long‑term investment.
The plan aims to strengthen national security while creating jobs and expanding domestic manufacturing.
Officials say the program will support infrastructure, technology development, and defense procurement.
The policy reflects rising geopolitical competition and pressure on NATO allies to boost capabilities.
Economists expect the investment to influence global supply chains and defense markets.
Some critics worry about the cost and its impact on government budgets.
People born under Capricorn may feel encouraged to focus on disciplined planning and responsibility.

articles.title: Meta and NVIDIA announce long-term AI infrastructure partnership
articles.title_kor: 메타·엔비디아 장기 AI 인프라 협력 발표
articles.summary_kor:
Artificial intelligence has become central to the global technology industry.
Meta and NVIDIA announced a long‑term partnership to expand AI data centers using advanced computing chips.
The companies plan to improve performance and efficiency for large‑scale AI training and services.
This agreement shows how tech firms are investing heavily in infrastructure rather than only software models.
Analysts say such partnerships could reshape competition in cloud computing and social media platforms.
The deal may also influence energy consumption and supply chains for semiconductors.
Investors are watching closely because AI spending affects global markets.
People born under Aquarius may feel inspired to explore new technological ideas and innovation.

articles.title: Bangladesh swears in new prime minister after political upheaval
articles.title_kor: 방글라데시 새 총리 취임, 정치적 변화 가속
articles.summary_kor:
Bangladesh has experienced political instability following protests and leadership changes in recent years.
A new prime minister was sworn in after a landslide election victory, signaling a new phase in governance.
The new administration promises reforms to prevent authoritarian rule and strengthen democratic institutions.
International observers are watching how the country manages economic recovery and political unity.
The leadership change may affect regional trade and South Asian diplomacy.
Citizens hope for stability after years of tension and conflict.
Political analysts believe policy decisions in the coming months will shape long‑term growth.
People born under Libra may feel encouraged to focus on balance and cooperation.

articles.title: Japan exports surge, raising expectations of Bank of Japan rate hike
articles.title_kor: 일본 수출 급증…금리 인상 기대 확대
articles.summary_kor:
Japan’s economy has faced long‑term challenges such as weak currency and slow growth.
New data shows exports rising sharply, especially shipments to China ahead of Lunar New Year demand.
This increase revived expectations that the Bank of Japan may raise interest rates soon.
Financial experts believe higher rates could strengthen the yen and reduce inflation pressure.
However, some analysts warn the surge may be temporary due to seasonal factors.
The policy decision could influence global currency markets and investor confidence.
Companies are also increasing share buybacks to attract investors.
People born under Virgo may feel motivated to review budgets and financial habits carefully.

articles.title: India and France launch Year of Innovation focused on AI cooperation
articles.title_kor: 인도·프랑스 AI 협력 중심 혁신의 해 출범
articles.summary_kor:
Countries are increasing technology partnerships to compete in artificial intelligence and defense innovation.
India and France announced a joint Year of Innovation initiative to strengthen cooperation in AI and digital technology.
The program includes research collaboration and startup support across both nations.
Leaders say ethical and human‑centered AI development is a major goal of the partnership.
The agreement also reflects strategic alignment in the Indo‑Pacific region.
Experts believe such cooperation could accelerate technological growth and military modernization.
The initiative may influence global standards for responsible AI.
People born under Gemini may feel energized to learn new skills or begin creative projects.

articles.title: 윤석열 전 대통령 1심 선고 예정…정국 긴장 고조
articles.title_kor: 윤석열 전 대통령 1심 선고 예정…정국 긴장 고조
articles.summary_kor:
한국 정치 상황은 최근 몇 년 동안 큰 변화를 겪으며 사회적 관심이 높아졌다.
윤석열 전 대통령에 대한 1심 판결이 예정되면서 정치권과 국민의 관심이 집중되고 있다.
이 사건은 과거 비상계엄 선포와 관련된 혐의를 중심으로 진행되고 있다.
선고 과정은 생중계될 예정이며 사회적 논쟁이 이어지고 있다.
정부와 야당 모두 판결 결과가 향후 정치 지형에 큰 영향을 줄 것으로 보고 있다.
전문가들은 정치적 갈등이 경제 정책에도 영향을 줄 수 있다고 말한다.
시민들은 사법 절차의 공정성과 사회 안정에 주목하고 있다.
People born under Leo may feel encouraged to act with confidence but remain patient.

articles.title: US military strikes small boats amid anti-drug operations
articles.title_kor: 미군 해상 공습 논란…마약 단속 작전 확대
articles.summary_kor:
The United States has increased maritime operations targeting suspected drug trafficking routes.
Recent strikes on several boats in the Caribbean and Pacific reportedly killed multiple people.
Officials say the actions were part of anti‑drug missions, but critics question the lack of evidence provided.
Human rights groups argue that due process and transparency are important concerns.
The incident highlights debates about military power and law enforcement beyond national borders.
International reactions may affect diplomatic relations with Latin American countries.
Security analysts warn such operations could increase regional tensions.
People born under Scorpio may feel driven to examine complex ethical questions this week.

articles.title: Global tech industry shifts toward massive AI infrastructure investment
articles.title_kor: 글로벌 기술업계 AI 인프라 투자 경쟁 심화
articles.summary_kor:
The technology sector is moving from small AI experiments toward large infrastructure projects.
Major companies are investing in data centers, chips, and new computing systems to support AI growth.
These investments show how competition is expanding beyond software into energy and hardware resources.
Experts say the race for computing power may change startup ecosystems and global supply chains.
Lower costs for advanced AI models could accelerate adoption across industries.
However, high capital spending raises concerns about sustainability and market bubbles.
Governments and regulators are also watching how AI expansion affects society.
People born under Sagittarius may feel curious about exploring future technologies and global trends.

articles.title: 이재명 대통령 집권 2년 차 국정 운영 전략 구상
articles.title_kor: 이재명 대통령 집권 2년 차 국정 운영 전략 구상
articles.summary_kor:
한국 정부는 설 연휴 이후 새로운 정책 추진을 준비하며 정치 일정이 본격화되고 있다.
이재명 대통령은 집권 2년 차를 맞아 부동산과 협치 문제 해결에 집중할 계획을 세우고 있다.
정책 성과를 강화하려는 움직임은 여야 관계와 사회 분위기에 영향을 줄 수 있다.
전문가들은 경제 정책 방향과 정치 협력이 중요해질 것이라고 분석한다.
정부에 대한 국민과 공무원 사이의 신뢰 인식 차이도 주요 과제로 언급된다.
향후 정책 추진 속도는 국내 시장과 투자 심리에 영향을 줄 가능성이 있다.
정치적 안정이 유지된다면 정책 실행력이 높아질 수 있다.
People born under Pisces may feel encouraged to focus on long‑term goals with patience.
